updateSources

private void updateSources(ProcessExecution execution)

atomicCommit

public ProcessResult atomicCommit(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
Evaluates partial results of running process. The atomicLength should be called if the process is still running after an atomicCommit call. This method may be called at random time. No ProcessTemplate implementation should expect any relation whith value returned by atomicLength function. So the implementation is assumed to be foolproof as much as possible.

Specified by:
atomicCommit in interface ProcessTemplate
Overrides:
atomicCommit in class CommonProcessTemplate
Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

initLod

protected void initLod(Substitution phantoms,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
Initializes "lod" parameter to a value on witch is this process atomic.

Parameters:
phantoms - Phantom substitution to be used as input.
params - Parameter map to be altered.

fillGoalWithSources

public void fillGoalWithSources(Goal goal,
                                Substitution sources)
Fills the goal substitution with the objects of the give substitution. The key - same slot name is the same and the slot hasn't been filled already -> put it there.

Parameters:
goal - The goal which substitution is to be filled
sources - Sources to look for the objects

Specified by:

Overrides:
